name: GeometryPlug
description: Connect your toys to Geometry Dash!

server-url.name: Server URL
server-url.description: Change the server URL. Must start with ws:// or wss://

death-vibration.name: Death vibration toggle
death-vibration.description: Toggle if device will vibrate on death

death-vibration-with-level-percentage.name: Death vibration with level percentage
death-vibration-with-level-percentage.description: Changes the death vibration strength based on the level percentage. Replaces the death vibration strength setting

invert-level-percentage.name: Invert level percentage
invert-level-percentage.description: Inverts the level percentage for death vibration (100% = 0%, 0% = 100%). Only applies if the above setting is enabled

death-vibration-strength.name: Death vibration strength
death-vibration-strength.description: Change the intestity of death vibrations

death-vibration-length.name: Death vibration length
death-vibration-length.description: Change the length of the vibration on death

shake-vibration.name: Shake vibration toggle
shake-vibration.description: Toggle if shake triggers vibrate device

percentage-vibration.name: Percentage vibration toggle
percentage-vibration.description: Toggle if device will vibrate as the level plays

complete-vibration.name: Complete vibration toggle
complete-vibration.description: Toggle if the device will vibrate on completetion of the level

complete-vibration-strength.name: Complete vibration strength
complete-vibration-strength.description: Change the intestity of completion vibrations
